## TransactionPayload class

The "data" field of a Transaction, as an immutable object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TransactionPayload 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(data)](./sdk-core.transactionpayload._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a TransactionPayload from a utf-8 string or from a buffer. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [encoded()](./sdk-core.transactionpayload.encoded.md) |  | Returns the base-64 representation of the data. |
|  [fromEncoded(encoded)](./sdk-core.transactionpayload.fromencoded.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates a TransactionPayload from a base-64 encoded string. |
|  [getEncodedArguments()](./sdk-core.transactionpayload.getencodedarguments.md) |  |  |
|  [getRawArguments()](./sdk-core.transactionpayload.getrawarguments.md) |  |  |
|  [isEmpty()](./sdk-core.transactionpayload.isempty.md) |  | Returns whether the "data" is void. |
|  [length()](./sdk-core.transactionpayload.length.md) |  | Returns the length of the data. |
|  [toString()](./sdk-core.transactionpayload.tostring.md) |  |  |
|  [valueOf()](./sdk-core.transactionpayload.valueof.md) |  | Returns the data as a buffer. |
